dependencies.MATLAB: required for executing the MATLAB script
dependencies.git: required for pulling and pushing updates to the website repository
dependencies.FieldTrip: required for generating the reference and configuration documentation
dependencies.matlab_sub: custom script for managing MATLAB execution resources

files.documentation.lock: lock file to prevent concurrent executions
files.documentation.log: log file to record execution timestamps
files.configuration.md: markdown file for the configuration index

directories.$HOME/fieldtrip/release/fieldtrip: root directory of the FieldTrip toolbox
directories.$HOME/fieldtrip/release/website: target directory for the website repository
